column12: As a customer,  I should able to login to the system in order to be eligible for promotion and get updated about the bus schedule.
column19: Verify username and password from the database.

column12: As a customer , I should able to edit the profile so that I can update my information when there is any changes.
column17: Retrieve customer information from the database.
column19: Update the customer information in the database.

column12: As a customer, I should be able to book a bus ticket in order to travel to other places
column17: Display list of available travel location
column21: Retrieve bus seat availability from database
column25: Update booking information into the database

column12: As a customer, I should be able to change my ticket details a week before the date of departure. This can provide convenience to me as I can choose a more suitable date and time.
column17: Retrieve booked ticket information from the database
column21: Check availability of the reselected booking information
column23: Update booking details into the database

column12: As a customer, I should be able to view my current booking information so that I am able to download and use it as a boarding pass.
column17: Retrieve customer specified booking information from the database.
column19: Display the booking information to the customer.

column12: As a customer, I should be able to cancel my ticket within a week time before the departure date and get a refund so that I would not be wasting my money.
column17: Retrieve customer booked ticket information from the database.
column19: Choose a booked ticket to be cancelled.
column21: Check the duration between current date and date of departure.
column23: Delete the booking information from the database.
column25: Update the seat availability in the database.
